_sText:
Original map by: Gargantua
mini game edit by: spite and Donkey Kong

Notes:
install to c:/program files/steam/steamapps/username/counter strike source/cstrike/maps

we would like to thank Gargantua for the original map making and encourage people to play the original map and of course this map.
This is a simple yet fun and addictive map we hope more people create mini game maps.

map info: run to escape from the killing force field wall get to the end grab a gun and knife and kill the opposing side, that's if they make it.


please enjoy the map.
